name: Racing Liberty
description:
Racing Liberty - This is Speed!
Racing Liberty is a brand new racing game come with beautiful race track and brilliant graphic rendering.
There are more than 30 different tracks and over 180 race events to complete.

Features:
Beautiful Race Track.
Brilliant Car Graphic Rendering.
More Than 29 Different Race Cars.
Car Upgrade and Painting.
Over 180 Racing Events For Different Class.
Wanderful Car Handling.
Support Joystick Or Keyboard Driving Control.
Synchronize Game Progress On Different Devices.

The UI design is so clean and player-friendly. You can easily grasp the basic logic of the game.
Select your favorite car, hit the start race button, and there we go. Let us enjoy the racing!

All the game progress will automatically synchronize through your multiple devices that signed in the same account. You won't lose your game progress any more.
By the way, you can even choose your bluetooth keyboard or joystick to be your driving controller, We have tested it on the Xbox One bluetooth controller. The key binding are showed at the setting menu.

At the garage, you can painting your cars to your favorite color or simply upgrade your car performance like top speed, acceleration and brake.
After you upgrade NOS boost, you can throw other competitor off the track.

Some specific race events are join to the world leaderboard. Try to compete with other players from all around the world.
Let's find out who's the best racer!
